message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you the chance to acquire a product that I believe will be highly valuable to you. While I can't disclose the specifics of the product just yet, I can assure you that its worth to you is at least $1200000. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1150000. This is a price that allows me to achieve my desired return while still offering you a significant value proposition. Consider this offer carefully. I'm confident that this product will be a strong asset for your business. Let me know your decision.
